>
[Ration Tonic](/Equipment.aspx?ID=723)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 259 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This slender vial appears to hold clean, clear water with a faintly fruity scent. Drinking a _ration tonic_ magically nourishes you with the equivalent of a day's worth of food and water. The tonic has a subtle, pleasant taste, its particulars chosen when the potion is crafted.

A _greater ration tonic_ nourishes you for 1 week instead of 1 day, distributing the nourishment in a constant and healthy flow across the week.
